name: Unity - Level Design Study
description:
A simple greybox 3D Platformer level design study that was built using the Physics Platformer Kit by Icarus Studios (no longer available) in Unity.

Designed to utilize preexisting mechanics built into the platformer by Icarus Studios in order to create a level that teaches and tests the players abilities.  It was designed to act similarly to one of the early "Bowser's Castle" levels from the 3D Mario series.

Players: 1

Length: 5-minutes

Engine: Unity
